translation.Message_0_Page_0: Yeah I could use some help if you don't mind. In factory building 1's kitchen, there's a generator that seems to be busted.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Along with that, factory building 3 with the tents has a room with a radio station, the microphone cable seems to be damaged.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: You can probably see what I'm getting at, if we fix the generator, patch up the cable, we might have a working radio station which would be very benificial.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: To do this you will need some tools and some tape. Which luckily I have all that in my tool box! You can borrow it just make sure to return it after.
